speaker: GORILLA
text: Your teeth, they're big and shiny, oh my!

speaker: DRAGON
text: Kate was about to turn and run,

speaker: LANA IGUANA
text: Wait Kate, Pepe's actually quite fun.

speaker: GORILLA
text: Oh really, with those sharp big teeth,

text: Seriously Kate, he's really so nice,
